achievements.name: Mare Nostrum
achievements.desc: Light up the maps of the following areas in Fontaine: Nostoi Region.

achievements.name: Sumphonia Sine Fine
achievements.desc: Light up the maps of the following areas in Fontaine: Sea of Bygone Eras.

achievements.name: A Mari Usque Ad Mare
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the Nostoi Region and the Sea of Bygone Eras in Fontaine.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Rhapsodia in the Ancient Sea
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the Nostoi Region and the Sea of Bygone Eras in Fontaine.

achievements.name: Domus Aurea Guide
achievements.desc: Follow 6 Seelie in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras to their Seelie Courts.

achievements.name: Ancient Sea Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 30 chests in the Nostoi Region and the Sea of Bygone Eras.

achievements.name: Ancient Sea Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 60 chests in the Nostoi Region and the Sea of Bygone Eras.

achievements.name: Ancient Sea Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 120 chests in the Nostoi Region and the Sea of Bygone Eras.

achievements.name: Ancient Sea Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.

achievements.name: Ancient Sea Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.

achievements.name: Ancient Sea Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in the Nostoi Region and Sea of Bygone Eras.

achievements.name: Echoes of the Grand Symphony
achievements.desc: Play all the melodies within the Ancient Autoharmonic Music Box
